com.agentdid127.resourcepack.library.utilities

Class BomDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agentdid127.resourcepack.library.utilities.BomDetector

  • public final class BomDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    Retrieved from http://www.javapractices.com/topic/TopicAction.do?Id=257. Detect and remove Byte Order Marks (BOMs) from text files saved with a Unicode encoding.

    Dev tool only. If you use this tool to remove BOMs, please ensure you have made a backup.

    This class assumes the UTF-8 encoding for the BOM, but is easily changed to handle any encoding. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Byte_order_mark for more info. JDK 5+.

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> removeBOMs()
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Find and remove BOMs from files under the given root directory. Overwrites files. Return the names of the affected files.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
